tool_description: Showing all Twitter news of Dutch news channels
name: Dutch Twitter Live
title: Dutch Twitter Live

api_list.name: Get Dutch Twitter News	From A Specific News Channel
api_list.description:
This will get all Twitter news of a specific news channel.

Available news outlets:
- NU.nl endpoint: nu.nl
- RTL Nieuws endpoint: rtl-nieuws
- Tweakers endpoint: tweakers
- Crypto insiders endpoint: crypto-insiders
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dutch-twitter-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/nu.nl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dutch-twitter-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dutch-twitter-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dutch-twitter-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Dutch Twitter News
api_list.description: This will get all recent Twitter news of various Dutch news channels
